lead_paragraph: An oven on wheels now has a bricks-and-mortar restaurant where the creative pies are among New York’s brick-oven best.

headline.main: Pizza Moto Comes to Rest in Brooklyn

abstract: Pete Wells reviews restaurant Pizza Moto at John Grace Bakery in Red Hook, Brooklyn.
